analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The three-based text in forward and reverse order according to the ideas

original: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca na bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an internal idea as condition, an external idea arises, a condition being by way of root.

original: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an external idea as condition, an internal idea arises, a condition being by way of root. (Abbreviated.)

analyzed: hetuyā dve pe avigate dve sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With root cause as condition, two … With no-cause as condition, two. (In all cases expanded.)
